input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Tie Bar"
Reference Product Name: "Non-Iron Dress Shirt"
Reference Product Description:
Meet your new wardrobe staple. This must have textured solid dress shirt is perfect for any occasion, keeping you looking your absolute best at work and on the weekends. Available in trim fit and standard fit. Need help finding your shirt size? Check out our Shirt Size Guide for the perfect fit.
Collar Style: Semi-spread. A popular collar style that has a wider spread between the collar points to accommodate the widest range of tie knots. Also the best collar type to dress down and wear without a tie.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Pronto Uomo Men's Modern Fit Micro Grid Spread Collar Dress Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Organic Cotton Seersucker Short-Sleeve Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Cutaway Collar Non-Iron Twill Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Charles Tyrwhitt Slim-Fit Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Nordstrom Trim Fit Premium Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Nordstrom Victoria St. Trim Fit Microcheck Cotton Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Nordstrom Easy Care Extra Trim Fit Plaid Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Nordstrom Trim Fit Oxford Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Wrinkle-Free Oxford Cloth Shirt'
  - Name='Michael Kors Men's Regular Fit Comfort Stretch Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Kenneth Cole Men's Ultimate Performance Slim Fit Dress Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Tropicwear Short-Sleeve Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Traditional Fit Sunwashed Canvas Shirt'
  - Name='Lands' End Men's Big Long Sleeve Buttondown Shirt'
  - Name='Nordstrom Traditional Fit Herringbone Dress Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Comfort Stretch Short-Sleeve Performance Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Comfort Stretch Corduroy Long-Sleeve Shirt'
  - Name='Calvin Klein Men's Slim Fit Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Nordstrom Short Sleeve Stretch Button-Up Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Non-Iron Oxford Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Signature Seersucker Madras Shirt'
  - Name='Calvin Klein Men's Refined Cotton Slim Fit Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Lands' End Women's Oxford Short Sleeve Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Lands' End No Iron Original Oxford Button Down Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Comfort Stretch Chambray Shirt'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pronto Uomo Men's Modern Fit Micro Grid Spread Collar Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a modern fit dress shirt with a spread collar, similar in formal style and fit to the reference dress shirt, though it may differ in fabric and ironing treatment.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Organic Cotton Seersucker Short-Sleeve Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a casual short-sleeve seersucker shirt made from organic cotton, differing in sleeve length and casual fabric from the non-iron dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Cutaway Collar Non-Iron Twill Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A non-iron dress shirt with a formal twill fabric and cutaway collar, closely aligning with reference productâ€™s non-iron feature and dress shirt category, though collar style differs slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Charles Tyrwhitt Slim-Fit Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim-fit dress shirt, likely non-iron though not specified; matches in fit and dress shirt function but lacks explicit collar and non-iron detail.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nordstrom Trim Fit Premium Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A trim fit, premium non-iron dress shirt very closely matches the reference product in fit, fabric treatment, and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nordstrom Victoria St. Trim Fit Microcheck Cotton Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Trim fit dress shirt with cotton fabric and microcheck pattern; likely similar in fit to reference but no mention of non-iron finish.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nordstrom Easy Care Extra Trim Fit Plaid Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Extra trim fit dress shirt with easy care finish; though not explicitly non-iron, it serves a similar market for low maintenance dress shirts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nordstrom Trim Fit Oxford Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Trim fit oxford cloth dress shirt likely similar in construction and formal use; non-iron status not specified but commonly used for dress shirts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Wrinkle-Free Oxford Cloth Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wrinkle-free (similar to non-iron) oxford cloth shirt aligns well with reference in performance and general dress shirt category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Michael Kors Men's Regular Fit Comfort Stretch Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Regular fit dress shirt with comfort stretch; relevant as a dress shirt but different fit and no mention of non-iron.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Kenneth Cole Men's Ultimate Performance Slim Fit Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit dress shirt with ultimate performance fabric likely includes wrinkle resistance, aligning with non-iron dress shirt features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Tropicwear Short-Sleeve Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short-sleeve casual shirt designed for warm climates, differing in formality, sleeve length, and likely fabric from reference dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Traditional Fit Sunwashed Canvas Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Traditional fit canvas shirt is casual and heavier in fabric, not aligning with formal, smooth non-iron dress shirt characteristics.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lands' End Men's Big Long Sleeve Buttondown Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve buttondown shirt in big sizes; relevant as a dress shirt but buttondown collar and sizing focus reduce direct relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nordstrom Traditional Fit Herringbone Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Traditional fit dress shirt in herringbone fabric; similar formal use though fit and fabric texture differ from trim fit textured solid shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Comfort Stretch Short-Sleeve Performance Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short-sleeve performance shirt with comfort stretch is more casual and sporty than a formal non-iron dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Comfort Stretch Corduroy Long-Sleeve Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Corduroy fabric and casual style decline relevancy to a formal dress shirt despite long sleeves.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Calvin Klein Men's Slim Fit Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit non-iron dress shirt directly matches reference product category, fabric treatment, and fit style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nordstrom Short Sleeve Stretch Button-Up Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve button-up with stretch is casual and less formal than the referenced non-iron dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Non-Iron Oxford Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron oxford shirt from a dress shirt brand aligns closely with the reference product's non-iron feature and formal use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Signature Seersucker Madras Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Casual seersucker madras shirt differs in fabric, texture, and casual style from formal non-iron dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Calvin Klein Men's Refined Cotton Slim Fit Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit refined cotton dress shirt is similar in style and construction, though no mention of non-iron finish slightly decreases relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lands' End Women's Oxford Short Sleeve Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve and women's cut reduce relevancy for a men's non-iron dress shirt despite similar oxford fabric.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lands' End No Iron Original Oxford Button Down Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: No iron oxford button down shirt closely matches non-iron fabric and dress shirt category; button down collar is a less formal collar style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Comfort Stretch Chambray Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Chambray fabric with comfort stretch is more casual and fabric differs notably from formal non-iron dress shirt fabric.
